snippet: The economy could benefit from two very different events last week: the announcement of the Federal Reserve’s latest bond-buying plan and Apple’s introduction of the iPhone 5.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column holds the economy could benefit from two very different events: Federal Reserve's announcement of its latest bond-buying plan and Apple’s introduction of the iPhone 5; maintains Fed's ambitious plan is by far the riskiest of the two, and Apple, by contrast, is operating from a position of strength.
lead_paragraph: The economy could benefit from two very different events last week: the announcement of the Federal Reserve’s latest bond-buying plan and Apple’s introduction of the iPhone 5.

headline.print_headline: Kick-Starts From a Phone and the Fed
headline.seo: From the Fed and Apple, a Possible Economic Lift
headline.main: Kick-Starts From a Phone and the Fed
